game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the ancient temple
game.description: Your task is to overcome dangers of ancient temple and retrieve a sacred artifact that has been lost for centuries.

task.description: The temple is located deep within the Enclave Forest. Chart your path carefully and avoid the treacherous beasts.
The artifact is said to be kept in a secret chamber guarded by ancient warriors. You will need to defeat them, bypass the traps and secure the artifact.
